import React, { useState } from 'react' import 'react-phone-number-input/style.css' import PhoneInput from 'react-phone-number-input' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { useUserAuth } from '../context/UserAuthContext' const PhoneSignUp = () => { const [number, setNumber] = useState("") const [error, setError] = useState(""); const { setUpRecaptcha } = useUserAuth("") const [otp, setOtp] = useState("") const [flag, setFlag] = useState(false) const [confirmOb, setConfirmOb] = useState(second) const getOtp = async (e) => { e.preventDefault(); setError(""); if (number === "" || number === undefined) { return setError("Please Enter valid Number"); } try { const response = await setUpRecaptcha(number); console.log(response) } catch (err) { setError(err.message) } console.log(number) } const verifyOtp = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); } return (
